data.text: @GlobalNational @SwitchHealthCA @mferreriptbokaw @GovCanHealth 66 hours later she finally got her negative test result back.  Pathetic.
@GlobalNational Wrong. Still need testy and a stupid app. End all Covid restrictions today
@GlobalNational So, in England, you can self administer a RAT, but that wonâ€™t be accepted. How does one get the test they need to return to Canada??

@trimikecanada @GlobalNational @mferreriptbokaw @GovCanHealth @trimikecanada Thanks for reaching out to us! If you send us a DM, we'll look into your situation right away!

@GlobalNational Unvaccinated Canadians are STILL not allowed to leave Canada
Trudeau belongs in a prison cell.

@GlobalNational Still discrimination by our gov't that Canadians cannot choose one Charter right without losing another. Bodily autonomy & mobility. Both are mine. @mferreriptbokaw Regardless of other countries' laws, Canada should not be punishing its own citizens.

@GlobalNational @SwitchHealthCA and other labs need to do better.  My wife was randomly selected and tested at YYZ Thursday night, 61 hours ago, and she STILL does not have results back.  The tests are useless and are punitive for travellers.  @mferreriptbokaw @GovCanHealth
